name: Camping Tent Instant Pop Up Dome 2 Person Automatic Waterproof Tent Easy Set Up Portable for Family Hiking Travel
short_description: 【Complete Accessories for More Stability】: The accessories are very complete, the whole set of equipment is all organized in one package, including 1 tent, 1 square top cover, 8 ground pegs and 4 windproof ropes, which increases the stability of the tent, effectively ensures the firmness and safety of the tent, and is very durable.

【Well Designed】: The interior of this awning is very cleverly set up. It has mesh windows on the inside so that you can roll up the shade from the inside when you want to see the view or ventilate. There is also an organizer pocket inside for easy storage of your cell phone and other items.

【Waterproof】: This camping tent has good waterproof performance, made of 210D Oxford cloth. The whole tent has three layers of waterproof material, which is more helpful to protect the tent from being soaked by water.

【Multipurpose】: This sunshade is customized for family outdoor outings with space for 2 adults or 3 children. It provides shade and resting area for outdoor sports activities, camping, beach, fishing, swimming, and also can be set up at home for kids entertainment and play if your house has enough space.

【Easy to Set Up and Portable】: The waterproof tent comes in a package measuring approximately 29.5"L x 5.5"W x 5.5"H, it won't take up much space, you can put it in your suitcase or carry it with you. Please read the instructions in the bag in detail before use, the tent is automatic and can be set up quickly in a short time.

name: Pop Up Tents for Camping,2-3 Person Tent Easy Setup,Waterproof & Windproof Camping Tents, 60S Instant Double Layer Tent for Trekking, Family, Backpacking
short_description: 【Fast Setup & Take Down】The hydraulic system of the pop up tent can quickly set up the camping tent in 60 seconds and dismantle it in 2 minutes. The installation can be completed with a light touch, making the assembly process simple and efficient, allowing you to enjoy your outdoor vacation fully.

【Double-layer camping tent】The double-layer instant pop-up tent adopts a unique adjustable canopy design, including a detachable outer tent and inner tent. The 2-3 person tent can be combined into a double-layer structure for better wind and waterproof effects. The outer tent can be used alone as a sunshade tent, outer tent cloth, pavilion, etc. Please note: the inner tent cannot be used alone after being disassembled.

【What you will get】You will receive a 2-3 person dome tent, as well as 4 windproof ropes, 10 stainless steel ground stakes and a storage size. Inner tent size: 210*180*105cm. Folding size: 78x 19 x18cm, you can easily pack the pop up tents for camping into a handbag. Whether you are camping with family or friends, you can enjoy ample ground space to move and store equipment.

【Waterproof and Durable】This waterproof tent uses sturdy fiberglass poles to cope with rugged terrain and seasonal changes; at the same time, the backpacking tent uses 210T flame-retardant polyester material to make thickened tent cloth, which is not only double-layer waterproof, but also reduces accidental damage and mosquito nuisance.

【Good ventilation】This tents for camping adopts a breathable design, with adjustable front and rear windows to maintain stable airflow, thick and durable, and effectively blocks bugs. The durable rain cover of the camping tent uses PU-coated waterproof polyester fabric and reinforced seams to effectively rainproof and windproof. Stay dry in heavy rain and cool on summer nights.
product_description: This innovative camping tent features a removable top section that doubles as a standalone pop up tent. With the included support poles and guy wires, you can quickly set it up to expand your campsite's living space, or use it as a shelter for gear, pets, or extra wind and rain.

name: Reactive Outdoor Tent - 3 Second Tent - 3 Sec Instant Pop Up Tent - Easy and Quick Setup Camping Tent - 1 Person Setup Waterproof Double Layer Outdoor Camping Tent
short_description: Fiberglass
Imported
Easy setup and takedown. It uses an advanced self-locking mechanism to secure its structure. You just need to pull up and lock it. Set up in seconds, allowing you to relax & clear your mind.
1 person setup in seconds. It's so quick and easy, you can do it all by yourself. No more asking somebody to thread and hold down the tent poles for you, or having long and stressful setups.

Easily fits back into bag. Our tent bag has an extra wide opening and uses sturdy buckle straps to secure the tent. No more struggling to fit your tent back into an impossibly small tent bag, or having the zippers stuck.
Waterproof with HH rating of 3000mm. 3 Second Tent is fully sealed & protected with taped seams. This keeps the water from getting into the tent, keeping you dry overnight during heavy rains.

name: Yaheetech Canopy Tent, Commercial Instant Heavy Duty Canopy, 500D Waterproof Adjustable Canopy with Wheeled Carry Bag, 4 Sandbags and 4 Stakes (10x10, White)
short_description: Weather-resistant Materials: This pop-up canopy tent boasts a robust 500D polyester canopy fabric, complete with a water-resistant PU coating and a UPF 50+ UV protective coating. The frame and truss are expertly crafted using sturdy powder-coated steel, ensuring exceptional strength and durability for all outdoor events

3 Adjustable Heights: By simply pressing the buttons, you can easily adjust the canopy height to 10.6', 10.9', or 11.2'. This allows you to customize it according to your requirements, whether you want to display products, create a comfortable shelter, or simply relax outdoors

Robust Construction For Outdoors: This pop-up canopy has a strong fabric of 500D polyester, with a PU coating and UPF 50+ UV protective coating to enhance water and sun resistance. The frame and truss are made of sturdy powder-coated steel, ensuring strength and durability for all your outdoor gatherings

Hassle-free Moving & Storing: Storing and transporting this heavy-duty canopy tent is a breeze, thanks to its compact folded size and roller storage bag. You can effortlessly roll it or carry it using the handles for short distances, or simply toss it in your trunk for longer trips

Complete Set For More Convenience: Not only will you get a durable canopy tent, but this set also includes all the necessary accessories to ensure you're fully covered. It has a roller storage bag, 4 anchor ropes, 4 metal ground anchors, and 4 sandbags

name: EchoSmile Camping Instant Pop Up Tent, 2/4/6/8/10 Person, Water Resistant Dome, Easy Setup for Camping Hiking and Outdoor, Portable with Carry Bag, 3 Season
short_description: Fiberglass
Imported

【QUICK & EASY SETUP】 Take the pop up tent out of the package, unstrap the tent, throw it into the air, it will be opened automatically in second. In just 10 seconds, our tent will bring you a pleasant camping experience.

【SPACE】 This instant tent has a spacious room (125.98” x86.61" x 51.18") which can fit 6 sleeping bags/pads. It is a good idea to be used as a family camping tent for family trip. Center Height: 51.18".

【QUALITY UPGRADE】We have improved our tent to achieve higher quality. The main improvement is of fiberglass tent pole. We cover junction of tent pole with heavy-duty steel protection tube, which adds more weight capacity to and prevents accidental breaking of tent pole to a large extent.

【GOOD VENTILATION】 The windows & doors with Double Panels, 4 Mesh windows and 2 doors provide optimal airflow for cross ventilation while keeping the bugs out. The front and back doors let you in and out easily, and you can zip up the inner and outer doors.

【WATER RESISTANT&WINDPROOF】 Cabin tent is the best choice for all outdoor activities. You can use it on sunny days or light raining days. The tent is sturdy enough to resist strong wind after being fixed by guy ropes and pegs. DO NOT USE IT IN EXTREME WEATHER OR HEAVY RAIN.
【WARRANTY】 EchoSmile tents are 100% inspected before delivery. The backpacking tent focuses on the ultimate performance such as lightweight, eco-friendly, super sturdy, and ultra weather resistant.
product_description: Welcome to EchoSmile, where outdoor adventures meet unparalleled comfort and convenience! Our pop up tents redefines camping experiences, offering the perfect harmony of durability, portability, and functionality. Seam-sealed rainflies and 210D Oxford Cloth floors provide unbeatable rain resistance, while robust fiberglass poles and stakes keep your shelter steadfast in gusty conditions. Our innovative self-pop design ensures the tent springs to life within 10 seconds, allowing you to spend less time setting up and more time reveling in nature's wonders! No matter your camping group size, EchoSmile has you covered. Choose from our range of 2-person, 4-person, and 6-person tents, ensuring ample space for everyone to unwind after a day of exploration. Order now and embark on your next adventure with EchoSmile by your side!

name: Alvantor Screen House Gazebo, 6-10-15 Person Pop Up Igloo Screened Canopy Tent with Mosquito Netting Sides, Instant UV Resistant Sun Shelter for Garden, Patio, Backyard
short_description: Roomy Space & Firmer Support : Compared with traditional version, Alvantor 2024 new release screen tent additional 4 sturdy steel top pole, which can provide more ample overhead space and no ponding on the top as well as better supportive.

2 In 1 Innovative Design: Two individual pop up gazebos are skillfully combined into an whole screen house through the stitching of the fabric and the double zipper structure. The central joint features roll-up zippered mesh screen, it can be use a whole canopy tent or 2 relatively independent privacy space depends on you.

All-Around Ventilation ＆ Bugs-Proof: The Alvantor portable screen room made of 4-sided B3+2 premium mesh, not only has 360° panoramic view and perfect ventilation, also keep the bugs or other insects out. Beneficial from the selected 210D Oxford fabric to achieve all-day UPF 50+ UV resistance. For better sun shade experience, you can purchase our matching tarp.

Easy To Assemble In Minutes: Alvantor upgraded screened gazebo features pop-up design, no extra tools needed, just need expand the panels and insert the 4 top poles, two person can set it up quickly and easily.

Multi-Purpose For All Your Needs: Measuring 12 x 6 feet with towering 7.5-feet height, our screen house offers ample space. Attached with carry bag for store and transport, this pop up canopy offering ample space for all sorts of outdoor activities, perfect for patio, backyard, deck, camping, party, lawn, poolside and so on, have a great time with your friends or families. Please do not use the tent in terrible weather.

name: CROWN SHADES 10x10 Pop Up Canopy - Beach Tent with One Push Setup - Easy Outdoor Sun Shade for Events, Parties, Camping - Gazebo with STO-N-Go Cover Bag, Silver Coated Top, Grid White
short_description: ONE BUTTON EASY SET UP - Our 10x10 pop up canopy tent features patented one push center lock tech. With just a single push, the central hub locks the poles in place. Designed for the next generation, this outdoor canopy for patio can be set up by two people in seconds without any tools. Three adjustable height settings with soft, pinch-free buttons ensure convenience and safety, making it perfect for camping, beach outings, craft fairs, tailgating, farmer markets, outdoor BBQs, and more

EZ CLIP CANOPY FABRIC - The new clip system easily attaches the canopy fabric to the frame. The silver-coated interior provides UPF 50+ UV protection, ensuring cooler and safer shade. Made from rugged 150D fabric, the pop up tent is water-resistant and flame-resistant (CPAI-84). Integrated air vents and the EZ Clip system prevent wind lift and rain pooling, reducing fabric tearing risks. This innovative design is ideal for outdoor events and gatherings

STO’ N GO SYSTEM - Our lift-free system makes collapsing, storing, and transporting the 10x10 tent a breeze. The 10x10 popup canopy can be stored with the fabric attached, with a specialized pocket for 4 sandbags, 8 stakes, and 4 guy ropes. Integrated wheels in the feet allow easy movement even when the instant shelter tent is set up, by simply lifting the side without wheels. This feature is especially useful for quick setup and takedown at locations like the patio or sports events

SPACIOUS AND COMPACT - With a 10' x 10' canopy footprint, this tent provides 100 square feet of shade, accommodating up to 10 people comfortably. The interior height exceeds 9 feet, and the maximum clearance under the valance is over 6 feet. When packed, the dimensions are 45” x 8.5” x 8.5”, fitting perfectly in your vehicle’s trunk. The headroom is enhanced by the absence of overhead crossbars, offering more spaciousness compared to traditional designs, making it great for parties and events

HIGH GRADE STEEL FRAME - The durable, high-grade, corrosion-resistant steel truss frame with hardened through bolts comes pre-assembled and can be set up without any tools. Engineered to support up to 120 lbs. distributed across the frame, it ensures robust and reliable performance. The extended ceiling assembly and upgraded high peak design make it easier for rainwater to run off, preventing water pooling on the canopy. Perfect for extended outdoor use at markets, festivals, and exhibitions

name: Night Cat Pop-up Camping Tent: 1 Person Tent Waterproof Instant Easy Setup Outdoor Tent
short_description: Polyester Taffeta
Imported

【Upgraded Folding Method, Easier Fold Back】Throw the tent to the ground, and spread the pole then it will open up instantly in 3 seconds. Folding back is easier than tranditional pop up camping tent, fold the easy setup tent like number "8" and repeat TWICE, please refer to the instructional video. Practice a few times, you'll get the method quickly

【Package 40% Smaller】Weight:1.5kg, Package size:21x21x2in. Tranditional pop tent fold in 3 circles while Night Cat Upgraded Pop up Tent fold in 4 circles narrowing the radius of circle to make it 40% Smaller in package. Hand strap and 2 back straps is convenient to carry the foldable tent

【Roomy For 1 Person】Inner size: 7.7x3.3x2.95 ft, fits well with twin size air mattress or Night Cat single sleeping air pads, roomy for 1 adults with spacious space to storage extra camping gears on the side of 1 person pop up tent

【Cool Ventilation with Porch】1 big doors and 2 wide windows allow the air flows and keep the instant pop up tent ventilated well, used as a Popup Beach Tent to enjoy cool breeze. The doors can be set up with your own trekking poles(Exclude in package) or outdoor sticks to be used as a Front Porch, providing a little shade when sitting in front of tent

【Rainproof & Windproof】 Waterproof 190T Polyester Taffeta PU 2000mm, waterproof tape on every seam, to ensure the inside camping tent pop up is totally dry under any rain situation even in the storm. 6mm stretched pole, pegs and guylines makes it strong and windproof

name: Hewolf 2/3/4 Person Camping Tent - Instant Pop Up Waterproof 2 Doors Tent with Easy Setup | 3-Season Hexagonal Dome Design for Family, Hiking & Traveling
short_description: Multi-Season Use: Designed for all-season performance, this camping tent is your ultimate companion for camping, hiking, and backpacking. With a spacious interior that comfortably accommodates 2-4 adults, it’s perfect for family camping trips, weekend getaways, or solo expeditions. Whether you’re braving winter snow or summer rain, its durable construction ensures reliable shelter in any weather

Installation design: Simple disassembly quick installation Open the top of the tent, according to the picture shows, just lift the top, open the mechanical device, and then fix the joint at the bottom in place, press down the position of the rod and spring instantaneously automatic installation

Waterproof material: We use outdoor 4500mm exclusive waterproof grade, using SBS zipper, 210T material at the bottom, 10000+ waterproof. With sealed seams and unique waterproof strips, it's the perfect companion to keep you dry and comfortable while camping in harsh climates

Enjoy outdoor: The tent can be detachable, two doors circulate air, give you enough air flow to have better ventilation, mesh screen to prevent mosquitoes from entering the tent, family tent with lantern hooks, mesh storage bag to store small items
Exclusive patent: Using high-grade Oxford cloth, fine workmanship

name: 10x10 Pop Up Canopy Tent Waterproof Tent for Outdoor Party Camping Commercial Event Tent, with Wheeled Bag and 4 Sandbags (Red)
short_description: High grade steel frame: Adopting an upgraded steel frame structure, pre assembled and can be installed without any tools. Reinforced stress points where peak poles meet and plastic parts ensure sturdy and reliable performance. Designing with vent on the roof is beneficial for ventilation and cooling. All of these make the pop up canopy tent durable and long-lasting.

Waterproof and UV resistant: This pop-up tent is made of sturdy 300D polyester PU coated fabric, providing great shade and sun-protection against UV rays.Rainshed fabric with waterproof strips provides good shelter even in rainy weather.

Ideal for various activities: This 10x10 canopy is easy to install and its 100 square feet of space can easily accommodate 8-10 people to sit in. Suitable for commercial, personal, and other outdoor activities such as picnics, commercial fairs, camping, garden parties, stalls, etc.

Full accessories: 10x10 pop-up party tent with wheeled carry bag for easy storage and transportation. This package also includes four luxury sandbags to keep the canopy tent stable from wind and rain. You don't need to purchase additional accessories to enjoy it.

Easy to install: No tools required, one person can quickly complete the installation. First unfold the assembled frame, then place the top on the frame for connection, push upward from the center of the frame, and finally adjust the height of the legs. Three adjustable heights to meet different usage scenarios.
